titleStmt.title: An expostulatory appeal to the professors of Christianity joyned in community with Samuel Ansley
titleStmt.author: Bathurst, Elizabeth, d. 1691.
Bathurst, Anne.

notesStmt.note: Signed by Elizabeth Bathurst, with a few words by Anne Bathurst at the end.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
